titles.title: To require the Secretary of Commerce to convey to the Commonwealth of Massachusetts the National Marine Fisheries Service laboratory located on Emerson Avenue in Gloucester, Massachusetts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 2/8/1994--Introduced. Provides for the conveyance by the Secretary of Commerce to the Commonwealth of Massachusetts of the National Marine Fisheries Service laboratory located on Emerson Avenue in Gloucester, Massachusetts.
